EmailTemplate.description: Explain the customer how to subscribe to the EGPWS database
EmailTemplate.name: EGPWS - Steps to subscribe to the database
EmailTemplate.subject: Steps to subscribe to the Terrain database {!Case.Account} {!Case.Sales_Order_Number__c} {!Case.Case_Number__c} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your email. In order to subscribe to the EGPWS Data base:
1.You will need to a log on to the portal at the following url: https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/training/topics/register, in order to get a Honeywell ID.
**If you already have a HOD ID, please proceed with step # 2.**
2. Once you have your HON ID please Log on to https://ads.honeywell.com:
Click on My Downloads (click on the "Go to my downloads blue tab") Two blue tabs will show in the next screen- Navdb & EGPWS Click on the EGPWS tab EGPWS registration form will be made available, fill out the form and submit. The EGPWS terrain database selected will be made available.
Attached, you will find the instructions on how to set up your Honeywell ID/User ID and the Steps to subscribe to EGPWS.
If you require any additional assistance feel free to reply to this email or contact us at the phone number below.
{!Case.OwnerFirstName}
Data Services
Account Management Representative(AMR)
email: dsa@honeywell.com
602-436-6739 Option 5
For 24-Hour/7-Day technical support, please contact ATS (Aerospace Technical Support) at 855-808-6500 for within the United States and 602-365-6500 for outside the United States,Fax 1-602-365-3343, or email AeroTechSupport@honeywell.com
